headline: When Your Heat “Still Works” — But Won’t for Long
mistake: Ignoring short-cycling heat because the house still feels warm.
escalation: A $300–$500 adjustment quietly turns into a $5,000+ mid-winter repair as cold snaps settle in.
warning: Early sign: heat turns on and off every few minutes or rooms won’t heat evenly.
insight: This pattern shows up in Westchester homes every winter.
